title: Is It Bad Parenting to Shave Your Child's Head When They Act Up?
itunes:title: Is It Bad Parenting to Shave Your Child's Head When They Act Up?
description:
Thursday 12/3 - Today on the show after seeing a video of a parent video taping her son after she shaved random patches of his hair off his head, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners thought it was bad parenting or not. Moreover, surprisingly the parent that did the video actually called up during "Ask Yee" to explain herself. We also opened up the phone lines for listeners to call and share who they want to give "Donkey of the Day" to, since Charlamagne is still relaxing in paradise. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
